statement.p: Based on the table, what is the stall speed in a 15 degree turn with flaps in the Up position?
Flight safety requires rounding up stall speeds. As a result, round up to the nearest integer.

solution.p: First, we look in the top row (bank angles) to find the nearest values. Note that 15 is half way between 0 and 30.
The entries in the Up row for these two columns are 48 and 52.
To interpolate we average \displaystyle\frac{{{48}+{52}}}{{2}}={50}\approx{50}. We round up to be safe.
